title: Comparative Analysis of Online Education Transition Experiences: Applying a Social Constructivist Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic usage of online learning tools and professional field practical experience
context.additional_context: A comparative analysis process where professionals in healthcare/legal/technical fields transition to online education based on real-world work scenarios in simulated environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three interaction strategies in online educational environments using a social constructivist approach.
Learners can design peer assessment and feedback processes in simulation/VR environments and apply them to real-world job problems.
Learners can develop a collaborative model among learners for forming online communities and conduct effectiveness verification.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
